Timecandy9.name: Timecandy9
Timecandy9.desc: 25% OFF, usually costs 395! A time candy that gives a random amount of time for a nonrandom cost of gems! @ These candies give up to 500 hours, but on average give 24 hrs.

ExpBalloon3.name: ExpBalloon3
ExpBalloon3.desc: The classic red balloon has evaded thousands of monkey darts just to get here! Just like they are free of their monkey torment, they are all free in cost!

Trophie.name: Trophie
Trophie.desc: Gives 25 trophies to spend in the Weekly Battle shop on new UI! Find the weekly battle in World 2 town, top right.

ClassSwapB.name: ClassSwapB
ClassSwapB.desc: Gives 1 Elite Class Swap token. Use this to swap between elite classes of a certain category, like Blood Berserker to Divine Knight

EquipmentCape0.name: EquipmentCape0
EquipmentCape0.desc: Gives you a random cape equipment, chosen from the ENTIRE pool of capes in the game! There are currently 13 capes, check the wiki if you want exact stats on all of them.

GemP25.name: GemP25
GemP25.desc: Gives you a random Circle Hyper Obol! The four equal possibilites are +4% DROP RATE, +2% ALL STAT, +3% DAMAGE, and +2% MULTIKILL PER TIER!

desc: 100 regular Arcade balls, but at a 33% Discounted Price! Great for getting more gold balls to buy upgrades with!
100 arcade balls. Use these at the Arcade, found at the clown in World 2 town! +20% better value compared to smol ball pack!
20% OFF, usually costs 480! Use this on a 4 star card to upgrade it to 5 stars! It works like 4 star cardifiers, you get to choose which card gets upgraded, no randomness involved!
10% OFF, usually costs 480! Use this on a 4 star card to upgrade it to 5 stars! It works like 4 star cardifiers, you get to choose which card gets upgraded, no randomness involved!
